title: Dilbert the Duck Visits Bryce Canyon National Park
description: Dilbert the Duck's imagination runs a little wild as he gets further from home, seeing some unexpected 'faces' in the hoodoos of Bryce Canyon National Park--and it only seems to get tougher from there. Luckily, Dilbert's not alone and ends up having one of his favorite adventures yet!
author: Debbie Houghton
